h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Once defeated, look to the right past where he appeared to find a broken walkway with several rock platforms you can carefully drop down to find the other side of the pagoda's Level 4 walkway.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 4)'.
The content is as follows:
Once defeated, look to the right past where he appeared to find a broken walkway with several rock platforms you can carefully drop down to find the other side of the pagoda's Level 4 walkway.
